menuId.description: App menu id used to get menu links.

selectedKeys.description: Array with the keys of currently selected menu items.

items.description: A menu item 'id' to be displayed as selected.

defaultOpenKeys.description: Array with the keys of default opened sub menus.

items.description: A menu item 'id' which should be open by default.

forceSubMenuRender.description: Render submenu into DOM before it becomes visible.

subMenuCloseDelay.description: Delay time to hide submenu when mouse leaves (in seconds).

subMenuOpenDelay.description: Delay time to show submenu when mouse enters (in seconds).

style.description: Css style to applied to link.

icon.description: Name of an Ant Design Icon or properties of an Icon block to customize icon on menu item.

danger.description: Apply danger style to menu item.

style.description: Css style to applied to sub-link.

danger.description: Apply danger style to menu item.

style.description: Css style to applied to sub-link.

danger.description: Apply danger style to menu item.

onSelect.description: Trigger action when menu item is selected.

onClick.description: Trigger action when menu item is clicked.

onToggleMenuGroup.description: Trigger action when mobile menu group is opened.
